channel.title: Disabling drops in [PI] Source for Admins?
channel.description: I need to make it so when my admins are killed they keep EVERYTHING. Right now they just drop to people and ruin my economy! Please help!

item.title: Disabling drops in [PI] Source for Admins?
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:3, topic:382394”]This is my code in PlayerAssistant.java [code]if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) {
if(!c.isSkulled) { // what items to keep
c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(1, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(2, true);
}
if(c.prayerActive[10] && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastProtItem > 700) {
c.getItems().keepItem(3, true);
}
c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items
c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items

				if(!c.isSkulled) { // add the kept items once we finish deleting and dropping them	
					for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) {
						if(c.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) {
							c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[i1], 1);
						}
					}
				}	[/code] Now what would i do to make it so that admins keep everything? I am pretty new and i need some help. Thanks for helping vain! :D[/quote]

[code]if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) {
if(!c.isSkulled) { // what items to keep
c.getItems().keepItem(28, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(28, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(28, true);
}
if(c.prayerActive[10] && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastProtItem > 700) {
c.getItems().keepItem(28, true);
}

                                    if(!c.isSkulled) { // add the kept items once we finish deleting and dropping them       
                                            for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) {
                                                    if(c.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) {
                                                            c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[i1], 1);
                                                    }
                                            }
                                    }    [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Disabling drops in [PI] Source for Admins?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

This is my code in PlayerAssistant.java [code]if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) {
if(!c.isSkulled) { // what items to keep
c.getItems().keepItem(0, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(1, true);
c.getItems().keepItem(2, true);
}
if(c.prayerActive[10] && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastProtItem > 700) {
c.getItems().keepItem(3, true);
}
c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items
c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items

				if(!c.isSkulled) { // add the kept items once we finish deleting and dropping them	
					for (int i1 = 0; i1 < 3; i1++) {
						if(c.itemKeptId[i1] > 0) {
							c.getItems().addItem(c.itemKeptId[i1], 1);
						}
					}
				}	[/code] Now what would i do to make it so that admins keep everything? I am pretty new and i need some help. Thanks for helping vain! :D

Read full topic
